hero.title: ASP.NET Core 8 + React + Shadcn/ui
hero.description: Complete template with ASP.NET Core 8, Inertia.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS and all 56 Shadcn/ui components. Start your next project in minutes, not hours.

inertia.title: Inertia.js

login.title: Login
login.description: Sign in to your account to continue

register.title: Create Account
register.description: Start your journey with us today

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Don't worry! Enter your email and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
forgotPassword.emailNotReceived: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or try again.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.description: Enter your new password for account
resetPassword.securityNote: For security, you will be automatically logged out from other devices.

success.title: Email Confirmed!
success.description: Your account has been successfully verified
success.enjoyPlatform: Now you can enjoy all the features of our platform.

error.title: Confirmation Error
error.linkUsed: The link has already been used
error.linkCorrupted: The link was corrupted or modified
error.persistentProblem: If the problem persists, contact our support.

resetPasswordConfirmation.title: Password Reset!
resetPasswordConfirmation.description: Your password has been successfully changed
resetPasswordConfirmation.passwordChanged: The password for account {email} has been successfully reset.
resetPasswordConfirmation.emailSent: A confirmation email has been sent to you with change details.
resetPasswordConfirmation.loggedOutDevices: You have been automatically logged out from other devices
resetPasswordConfirmation.keepSecure: Keep your new password in a secure place
resetPasswordConfirmation.dontShare: Don't share your password with anyone
resetPasswordConfirmation.securityAlert: If you didn't make this change, contact us immediately.

emailConfirmation.accountReady: Your account has been successfully activated. You can now access all platform features.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our service. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring transparency about our data practices.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We collect information you provide directly to us and data generated automatically during your use of our services:
dataCollection.personalInfo: Personal information such as name, email, and phone
dataCollection.accountInfo: Account data including preferences and settings
dataCollection.usageData: Information about how you use our service
dataCollection.technicalData: Technical data such as IP address and browser type

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.description: We use your information for the following purposes:
dataUsage.communicate: Communicate with you about updates and support

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your information:
dataProtection.encryption: Data encryption in transit and at rest
dataProtection.accessControl: Strict access control to your data

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not sell your personal information. We share data only in the following situations:
dataSharing.legal: When required by law or legal process
dataSharing.serviceProviders: With third-party service providers under strict contracts

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
yourRights.access: Right to access your personal information
yourRights.erasure: Right to request deletion of your data

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about this policy or want to exercise your rights, contact us:

status.title: Exchange Status
status.offlineWarning: Offline mode: using cached or static rates.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Please read our terms and conditions of service use carefully.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content1: Welcome to ASP.NET Stack. These Terms of Service govern the use of our platform and services. By accessing or using our service, you agree to comply with these terms.
introduction.content2: If you disagree with any part of these terms, then you may not access or use our services.

service.title: 2. Service Description
service.content1: ASP.NET Stack is a development platform that offers:
service.feature1: Complete template for modern web development
service.feature2: Integration with ASP.NET Core, React and TypeScript

obligations.title: 3. User Obligations
obligations.content1: By using our services, you agree to:
obligations.rule1: Provide accurate and up-to-date information during registration
obligations.rule2: Maintain the security of your account and password
obligations.rule3: Not use the service for illegal or unauthorized activities
obligations.rule5: Not attempt to compromise the security or functionality of the platform

intellectual.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content1: All content, design, source code and functionalities of ASP.NET Stack are our property and are protected by intellectual property laws.
intellectual.content2: You receive a limited and non-exclusive license to use our services as permitted by these terms.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.content1: Our services are provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free.
liability.content2: Under no circumstances shall we be liable for indirect, incidental, special or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.

termination.title: 6. Account Termination
termination.content1: You may terminate your account at any time through profile settings or by contacting us.
termination.content2: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms of service or our acceptable use policy.

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.content1: We may update these Terms of Service periodically. When we make significant changes, we will notify you by email or through the platform.
changes.content2: Continued use of our services after changes will constitute your acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: 8. Contact Information
contact.content1: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

components.title: shadcn/ui Components
components.description: Explore and test all available shadcn/ui components with practical examples and ASP.NET Core 8 integration.

card.title: Card
card.description: Displays a card with header, content, and footer.

basicCard.title: Basic Card
basicCard.projectDescription: Deploy your new project in one-click.
basicCard.projectContent: You can create a new project by clicking the button below.

userProfile.title: User Profile Card
userProfile.name: Sarah Johnson
userProfile.bio: Full-stack developer passionate about creating amazing user experiences.

button.title: Button
button.description: Displays a button or a component that looks like a button.

alert.title: Alert
alert.description: Displays a callout for user attention.

basicTypes.title: Basic Alert Types
basicTypes.description: Different alert types for various message contexts
basicTypes.defaultMessage: This is a default alert message with some additional information.
basicTypes.destructiveMessage: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
basicTypes.warningMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account.
basicTypes.infoMessage: You can add components to your app using the cli.

success.title: Success Alerts
success.profileUpdated: Profile updated successfully! Your changes have been saved.
success.dataExported: Data exported successfully. Check your downloads folder.
success.paymentProcessed: Payment processed successfully. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly.

warning.title: Warning Alerts
warning.storageAlmostFull: Your storage is almost full. Consider upgrading your plan.
warning.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Save your work before continuing.
warning.weekPassword: Your password is weak. Use at least 8 characters with numbers and symbols.

error.title: Error Alerts
error.saveError: Failed to save changes. Please check your connection and try again.
error.authError: Authentication failed. Invalid username or password.

info.title: Info Alerts
info.newFeatures: New features are available in this update. Check out the changelog for details.
info.keyboardTip: Use keyboard shortcuts to navigate faster: Ctrl+K to open search.

dismissible.title: Dismissible Alerts
dismissible.description: Alerts that users can close or dismiss
dismissible.welcomeMessage: Welcome! Your account has been created successfully.
dismissible.emailVerification: Don't forget to verify your email address to unlock all features.
dismissible.temporaryAlert: This alert will disappear in 3 seconds automatically.

profile.title: User Profile
profile.personalInfoDescription: Update your personal information and contact details.
profile.changePasswordDescription: Keep your account secure by changing your password regularly.
profile.emailNotVerifiedMessage: Your email has not been verified yet. Check your inbox.
profile.emailChangeNote: When changing your email, you will need to confirm the new address.
profile.accountStatusDescription: Information about your account verification status.
profile.dangerZoneDescription: Irreversible actions that permanently affect your account.
profile.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
profile.deleteAccountWarning: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently removed from our servers.

overview.title: Components Library
overview.description: Comprehensive collection of 40+ modern UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS.

features.title: Advanced Features
features.description: Fully accessible components with theme support, smooth animations, and responsive design.

integration.title: ASP.NET Integration
integration.description: Practical examples showing how to use each component with ASP.NET Core 8 and Inertia.js.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.step1: ‚Ä¢ Navigate through components using the sidebar
gettingStarted.step2: ‚Ä¢ Each component page includes multiple examples and use cases
gettingStarted.step3: ‚Ä¢ All examples are fully integrated with ASP.NET Core 8 and Inertia.js
gettingStarted.step4: ‚Ä¢ Copy code snippets to use in your own projects
